name: Jumping jet
storyline: the player is a mechanical engineer that while experimenting accidentally opened a portal to a alternate universe like earth but different so they pick up there jet just in case if they need it and enter the portal but what the player didn't know is when the player enters the portal there would be no way back
summary:
Jumping jet is a challenging arcade game about flying through platforms while trying to avoid setting a trap of or flying into them 
 
The game is all about fun puzzles to solve, improving your reaction skills 
 
At the moment the game is under development which means from the 10 areas of the game only 1 is fully finished and public
